base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Check Result
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Check Results

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsCheckResult %} {% endfor %}
id agent_id assigned_check_id status alert_severity more_info last_run fail_count outage_history extra_details stdout stderr retcode execution_time history
{{ item.id }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.assigned_check_id }} {{ item.status }} {{ item.alert_severity }} {{ item.more_info }} {{ item.last_run }} {{ item.fail_count }} {{ item.outage_history }} {{ item.extra_details }} {{ item.stdout }} {{ item.stderr }} {{ item.retcode }} {{ item.execution_time }} {{ item.history }}
{% endblock %}
